channel.title: Home of Mert Bozkir on Mert's Bert

item.title: Introduction
item.description: I’m starting to write public journals, my learning process and other technical blogs. I spent most of my time with creating this blog site today. I hate web development, somehow I finished with cool tools like Jekyll. ðŸ’• Still there are some bugs, one of them is footer links are not opening in another tab. I looked every little hole (even blackhole!) but couldn’t find a solution. It’s night here, I still have unfinished tasks but I’m writing my first blog.
